ReportManifest.Name: HCUP County Hospital Stays Summary Report

Column.Name: Aggregate number of days in the hospital
Number of inpatient days per 100,000 population
Aggregate costs for all hospital stays
Costs for inpatient stays per capita

ReportManifest.ReportOutputSQL: ;with COUNTIES_CTE (county_fips, county_name, [total_number_of_discharges], [discharge_rate_100k_population], [mean_los],[numb_of_days_in_hospital], [numb_inpatient_days_100K_population], [mean_cost_stay], [agg_costs_all_hosp_stays], [costs_inpatient_stays_per_capita], [state]) as ( SELECT DISTINCT chs.[county_fips], c.[Name] 'county_name', chs.[total_number_of_discharges], chs.[discharge_rate_100k_population], chs.[mean_los],chs.[numb_of_days_in_hospital], chs.[numb_inpatient_days_100K_population], chs.[mean_cost_stay], chs.[agg_costs_all_hosp_stays], chs.[costs_inpatient_stays_per_capita], chs.[state] FROM [dbo].[Targets_HCUPCountyHospitalStays] chs INNER JOIN [dbo].[Base_Counties] c ON c.[CountyFIPS] = chs.[county_fips] WHERE chs.[state] IN ([@@REPORTING_STATES@@]) AND chs.[Dataset_id]=[@@DATASET_ID@@] ) SELECT DISTINCT -1 'county_fips', ('State Total') 'county_name', Sum(chs.[total_number_of_discharges]) 'total_number_of_discharges', AVG(chs.[discharge_rate_100k_population]) 'discharge_rate_100k_population', AVG(chs.[mean_los]) 'mean_los',SUM(chs.[numb_of_days_in_hospital]) 'numb_of_days_in_hospital', SUM(chs.[numb_inpatient_days_100K_population]) 'numb_inpatient_days_100K_population', AVG(chs.[mean_cost_stay]) 'mean_cost_stay', SUM(chs.[agg_costs_all_hosp_stays]) 'agg_costs_all_hosp_stays', SUM(chs.[costs_inpatient_stays_per_capita]) 'costs_inpatient_stays_per_capita', chs.[state] FROM [dbo].[Targets_HCUPCountyHospitalStays] chs WHERE chs.[state] IN ([@@REPORTING_STATES@@]) AND chs.[Dataset_id]=[@@DATASET_ID@@] GROUP BY chs.[state] UNION SELECT DISTINCT cCTE.[county_fips], --cCTE.[county_name], ('' + cCTE.[county_name] + '') 'county_name', Sum(cCTE.[total_number_of_discharges]) 'total_number_of_discharges', AVG(cCTE.[discharge_rate_100k_population]) 'discharge_rate_100k_population', AVG(cCTE.[mean_los]) 'mean_los',SUM(cCTE.[numb_of_days_in_hospital]) 'numb_of_days_in_hospital', SUM(cCTE.[numb_inpatient_days_100K_population]) 'numb_inpatient_days_100K_population', AVG(cCTE.[mean_cost_stay]) 'mean_cost_stay', SUM(cCTE.[agg_costs_all_hosp_stays]) 'agg_costs_all_hosp_stays', SUM(cCTE.[costs_inpatient_stays_per_capita]) 'costs_inpatient_stays_per_capita', cCTE.[state] FROM COUNTIES_CTE cCTE GROUP BY cCTE.[county_fips], cCTE.[county_name], cCTE.[state]

ReportManifest.Name: HCUP County Hospital Stays Detail Report

Column.Name: Aggregate number of days in the hospital
Number of inpatient days per 100,000 population
Aggregate costs for all hospital stays
Costs for inpatient stays per capita

ReportManifest.ReportOutputSQL: SELECT DISTINCT h.[Id] 'hospital_id', h.[Name] 'hospital_name', chs.[state], chs.[county_fips], chs.[total_number_of_discharges], chs.[discharge_rate_100k_population], chs.[mean_los], chs.[numb_of_days_in_hospital], chs.[numb_inpatient_days_100K_population], chs.[mean_cost_stay], cast(chs.[agg_costs_all_hosp_stays] as numeric(32,2)) 'agg_costs_all_hosp_stays', chs.[costs_inpatient_stays_per_capita], ('' + h.[Name] + '') 'profile_lnk' FROM [dbo].[Targets_HCUPCountyHospitalStays] chs INNER JOIN [dbo].[Base_Counties] c ON c.[CountyFIPS] = chs.[county_fips] INNER JOIN [dbo].[Hospitals] h ON h.[LocalHospitalId] = chs.[local_hospital_id] WHERE chs.[state] IN ([@@REPORTING_STATES@@]) AND chs.[Dataset_id]=[@@DATASET_ID@@] GROUP BY h.[Id] , h.[Name] , chs.[state] , chs.[county_fips] , chs.[total_number_of_discharges] , chs.[discharge_rate_100k_population] , chs.[mean_los] , chs.[numb_of_days_in_hospital] , chs.[numb_inpatient_days_100K_population] , chs.[mean_cost_stay] , chs.[agg_costs_all_hosp_stays] , chs.[costs_inpatient_stays_per_capita];
